summary: Web application with form submission functionality experiencing errors
known_issues: Form submission failing with error message 'Failed to submit form. Please try again.'

existing_features.title: Investigate and fix the form submission failure in PatientFormPage that causes the 'Failed to submit form. Please try again.' error message to appear when users submit the patient intake form
Add proper error logging and validation feedback to identify the root cause of submission failures, including network errors, backend validation issues, or data format problems
